message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.ST

Reasoning: The paper deals with statistical learning and optimization, which are core topics in machine learning. The use of exp-concave loss functions is also a common technique in machine learning. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of exponential weights algorithms, which are commonly used in information theory (cs.IT). The algorithmic techniques used in the paper also have connections to optimization and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the use of online learning, which is a subfield of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Lastly, the paper deals with statistical inference and estimation, which is a topic in statistics (cs.ST).
